h2_title: Father of Stones Boss Fight and Guide
content: He will sometimes leap in the air and try to land on you. Again, these can be dodged and ignored by stepping back. This is actually the case for most of his attacks, so bait him out to hit you and then take advantage of the slow recovery. If you stand behind him too long though, he'll sit down and quickly push himself toward you, rolling over and over to try and catch you.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Father_of_Stones.md', within the main section titled 'Father of Stones', specifically from the subsection 'Father of Stones Boss Fight and Guide'.
The content is as follows:
He will sometimes leap in the air and try to land on you. Again, these can be dodged and ignored by stepping back. This is actually the case for most of his attacks, so bait him out to hit you and then take advantage of the slow recovery. If you stand behind him too long though, he'll sit down and quickly push himself toward you, rolling over and over to try and catch you.
